mapper.select: SELECT T.TYPE_NAME, SUM(I.ORDER_CNT * P.PRICE) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM ORDER_ITEM I, ITEM_TYPE T, ITEM P WHERE I.ITEM_NUM = P.ITEM_NUM AND T.TYPE_NUM = P.TYPE_NUM AND MONTH(I.ORDER_DATE) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AND YEAR(I.ORDER_DATE) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) GROUP BY T.TYPE_NAME ORDER BY T.TYPE_NAME;
